about.name: Hi, I'm Rafael Gaitan
about.profession: Front-end developer with 4+ years of experience in web and mobile applications
about.summary: I'm driven by challenges and love crafting elegant solutions to complex problems
about.summaryTwo: I believe in the power of good clean code, clear, and purposeful
about.summaryThree: I collaborate, listen, propose and adapt, because every project deserves something unique
about.summaryFive: A true commitment to every line of code? Always.

agrocollect.title: AgroCollect
agrocollect.description:
Mobile app (offline-first) used by an NGO to support agricultural producers across Colombia. 
 I worked in the implementation of a custom CMS for content management, documented user flows, features, and structured the full technical documentation.
This solution enabled data collection without internet access, improving field operations and decision-making for multiple agricultural initiatives.

riskmann.title: RiskMann
riskmann.description:
Inspection platform for tools, equipment, and facilities using customizable templates.
 I contributed to building dynamic interfaces to schedule inspections, manage action plans, and visualize data.
The platform improved the inspection workflow and helped reduce reporting time by centralizing key safety metrics.

iper.title: IPER
iper.description:
Real-time risk matrix management system focused on workplace safety.
 I worked on features to identify, assess, and control risks, enabling tailored action plans per activity.
The system empowered companies to track risk exposure live and comply with local safety regulations more efficiently.

scow.title: SCOW
scow.description:
Security company management platform for handling clients, users, weapons, and ammunition inventory.
 I developed modules for inventory tracking, client management, and internal controls.
The platform streamlined logistics and compliance for companies handling regulated equipment.

contact.descriptionOne: Hi! I'm Rafael Gaitán. I come from Yopal, a small town in Colombia where I grew up, completed school, and earned my degree as a Systems Engineer.
contact.descriptionTwo: I've always been fascinated by how differently people perceive problems, and I think that's where my passion was born: finding unique solutions for unique challenges. To me, programming isn't just about writing code it's about understanding, adapting, and constantly learning.
contact.descriptionThree: Outside of the screen, I love cooking (it's my favorite way to disconnect), working out at the gym, and occasionally playing rugby.
contact.descriptionFour: I like to believe that, both in sports and in life, staying active and always learning is the key to continuous growth.
contact.descriptionFive: I believe that staying active and constantly learning applies just as much inside the code as it does outside of it.
